title: Kalista V Tryndamere.
body: Kalista never actually shows her back to Tryndamere when kiting due to the passive but the game registers as if she is. Fix pls.

replies.body:
It counts.

Just like when Katarina ults vs Cassiopeia - the game registered whatever direction she was facing before she ulted.

Or, better, example is Lucian. Which ever direction you're running in is where you are facing, no matter what the character model shows.
Im pretty sure the kat one is just random whether it stuns or not.

> Im pretty sure the kat one is just random whether it stuns or not.

From the wiki

"Additional Information:

The facing direction of champions whose abilities/animations cause them to spin is always the direction they are moving in. In the event of abilities that cause the champion to spin on the spot, such as Katarina's  Death Lotus, it will factor the direction they were facing on-cast.
Lucian is facing in the direction he is moving during The Culling, not the direction his model is facing."
Someone tested that a while back though and results were inconsistent.
